body:
### Welcome to Bootstrap Samples

[Bootstrap Layout](http://odetocode.github.com/bootstrap-samples/bootstraplayout.html) let's you add and remove Bootstrap styling and see how it works on a grid and fluid grid (both in and out of a container element).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: A sample to experiment with grids, fluid grids, and responsive layout
name: Bootstrap-samples
